titles.title: To require the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to collection, collation, and reporting of labor statistics to direct the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.
